reviewText: Was not specific on was language the item was originally and was disappointed that it could not be changed in English or Spanish.

This is the second season of one of my favorite German shows - very German, which I love about it as I love everything German; super funny, great language, great actors especially the two main characters. I do recommend watching the first season first and the third one is just a knock-out (my favorite) but number 2 is amazing too.
